SEARCH
Package dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.commands

Class CommandRegistry

java.lang.Object
dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.commands.CommandRegistry
public final class CommandRegistry extends Object
Handles registration and initialization of commands in Fabric.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public static void initialize(String modName, String permissionPrefix, dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.Logger loggerInstance)
      Initializes the command registry with the mod name and permission prefix.
      Parameters:
      modName - mod name for namespaced commands
      permissionPrefix - prefix for permissions
      loggerInstance - magicutils logger

    • initialize

      public static void initialize(String modName, String permissionPrefix, dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.Logger loggerInstance, int opLevel)
      Initializes the command registry with an explicit op level.
      Parameters:
      modName - mod name for namespaced commands
      permissionPrefix - prefix for permissions
      loggerInstance - magicutils logger
      opLevel - permission level to treat as OP

    • create

      public static CommandRegistry create(String modName, String permissionPrefix, dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.Logger loggerInstance)
      Creates a registry instance without replacing the default registry.
      Parameters:
      modName - mod name for namespaced commands
      permissionPrefix - prefix for permissions
      loggerInstance - magicutils logger
      Returns:
      registry instance
